name: NES Mario Kart
overview:
It’s Mario Kart… for the NES!!! Join Mario, Luigi, Wario, and Waluigi, to see who has what it takes to become a racing champion. Collect power ups along the way to upgrade your kart, and to battle the other racers. Upgrade your players to race as Toad and his buddies, as well as Yoshi and his friends.

NOTE: This is a rom hack of RC Pro-Am.
